message: Am in need of a solution that can push updates to my website as they happen.
Something similar to this or facebook chat
pusher.com  is easy to implement. In node.js land I would look into socket.io.
Are these kind of services independent of services like apache and nginix?
Am in need of something that can also handle multiple services
Need too run different things separately... like one for messages, one for scores, then one for messages but to and for another site
Also need something that is free, got my own dedicated server
Do you have one server running providing each service?
we use xmpp on the www.LiveFanChat.com sites
might look into using for testing then and use some service that I run on my server later

@aranw. socket.io is free if you run it on your own server, pusher.com is up to a certain amount of messages per day, it is a hosted webservice. Both are independent of apache and nginx. And you can send all kinds of messages, so can send one message type for scroes, and so on. pusher.com has the huge advantage that you can get it up and running in 30 minutes, and you can also use it to prototype your final solution.
